imgDesc.text: Energy blocks can be naturally occurring or artificially created, and are separated into Pneuma Blocks and Ousia Blocks. After collecting an energy block, your next <color=#ffe14b>Normal, Charged, or Plunging Attack</color> will, upon hit, release the energy stored within them. This will come in handy when adventuring in a place like Fontaine.

With the aid of these energy blocks, characters can unleash Pneuma or Ousia energies even while <color=#ffe14b>underwater</color> .
Most characters from Fontaine have an Arkhe, and thus can use their attacks to trigger energies <color=#ffe14b>corresponding to their Arkhe attribute</color> underwater without the use of Pneumousia Blocks.
